pr_title: Prune attestations from the aggregating pool

timeline.message:
Prune attestations from the aggregating pool.
Fire slot events even while syncing so pruning actions are applied.

timeline.bodyText:
nit: I was almost writing:

It would be nice to explicitly set the slot of the pruneAttestationData here. Otherwise, what if randomly it has a higher slot than the preserveAttestationData? AggregatingPool would clean both of them.

Then noticed the randomAttestationDataToIncludeInBlock method actually sets the slot to SLOT - 1. It's a bit hard to see especially when looking at git diffs.
timeline.author: cemozerr

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into prune-attestation-aggregate-pool
Clarify and simplify the slot used for the attestation.
